letters.description: Establish rapport, assess client's current state of nervous system dysregulation, and clarify their goals for regulation.

Utilize somatic awareness techniques and assessments to identify triggers, patterns, and underlying beliefs contributing to dysregulation; acknowledge the client's experience with empathy and validation.
Educate the client on the neurobiology of nervous system regulation and teach practical skills (e.g., breathwork, grounding, vagal toning) to liberate them from reactive patterns.
Develop a personalized regulation plan, implement strategies for ongoing self-monitoring, and provide support for sustaining long-term nervous system balance and resilience.
